Uses of Class
org.achartengine.compat.NumberFormat

  • Packages that use NumberFormat 
    Package Description
    org.achartengine.chart
    Provides the classes that handle the actual rendering / drawing of the charts, based on the provided model and renderer.
    org.achartengine.compat  
    org.achartengine.renderer
    Provides renderer classes that keep the chart rendering / drawing styles.

    • Uses of NumberFormat in org.achartengine.chart

      Methods in org.achartengine.chart with parameters of type NumberFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.lang.String AbstractChart.getLabel(NumberFormat format, double label)
      Makes sure the fraction digit is not displayed, if not needed.

      NumberFormat XYMultipleSeriesRenderer.getLabelFormat()
      Deprecated. 
      use getXLabelFormat and getYLabelFormat instead

      Returns the number format for displaying X axis labels.

      Returns the number format for Y axis displaying labels.
